# confidence

**Instance Property**

The confidence level of the heart rate value.

## Declaration

```swift
var confidence: CMHighFrequencyHeartRateDataConfidence { get }
```

## Accessing heart rate data

- **heartRate**: The heart rate value in units of beats per minute (BPM).
- **CMHighFrequencyHeartRateDataConfidence**: The level of confidence in the accuracy of the heart rate data.
